1: וַיְהִ֥י <sup>1961 </sup> <n>came</n> דְבַר־ <sup>1697 </sup> <n>The word</n> יְהוָ֖ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>of the LORD</n> אֵלַ֥י <sup>413 </sup> <n>to me</n> לֵאמֹֽר׃ <sup>559 </sup> <n>came again unto me saying</n>
2: בֶּן־ <sup>1121 </sup> <n>Son</n> אָדָ֑ם <sup>120 </sup> <n>of man</n> שְׁתַּ֣יִם <sup>8147 </sup> <n>there were two</n> נָשִׁ֔ים <sup>802 </sup> <n>women</n> בְּנ֥וֹת <sup>1323 </sup> <n>the daughters</n> אֵם־ <sup>517 </sup> <n>mother</n> אַחַ֖ת <sup>259 </sup> <n>of one</n> הָיֽוּ׃ <sup>1961 </sup> <n>become</n>
3: וַתִּזְנֶ֣ינָה <sup>2181 </sup> <n>And they committed whoredoms</n> בְמִצְרַ֔יִם <sup>4714 </sup> <n>in Egypt</n> בִּנְעוּרֵיהֶ֖ן <sup>5271 </sup> <n>in their youth</n> זָנ֑וּ <sup>2181 </sup> <n>they committed whoredoms</n> שָׁ֚מָּה <sup>8033 </sup> <n>there</n> מֹעֲכ֣וּ <sup>4600 </sup> <n>pressed</n> שְׁדֵיהֶ֔ן <sup>7699 </sup> <n>there were their breasts</n> וְשָׁ֣ם <sup>8033 </sup> <n>and there</n> עִשּׂ֔וּ <sup>6213 </sup> <n>and there they bruised</n> דַּדֵּ֖י <sup>1717 </sup> <n>the teats</n> בְּתוּלֵיהֶֽן׃ <sup>1331 </sup> <n>of their virginity</n>
4: וּשְׁמוֹתָ֗ן <sup>8034 </sup> <n>And the names</n> אָהֳלָ֤ה <sup>170 </sup> <n>of them [were] Aholah</n> הַגְּדוֹלָה֙ <sup>1419 </sup> <n>the elder</n> וְאָהֳלִיבָ֣ה <sup>172 </sup> <n>and Aholibah</n> אֲחוֹתָ֔הּ <sup>269 </sup> <n>her sister</n> וַתִּֽהְיֶ֣ינָה <sup>1961 </sup> <n>became</n> לִ֔י וַתֵּלַ֖דְנָה <sup>3205 </sup> <n>and they were mine and they bare</n> בָּנִ֣ים <sup>1121 </sup> <n>sons</n> וּבָנ֑וֹת <sup>1323 </sup> <n>and daughters</n> וּשְׁמוֹתָ֕ן <sup>8034 </sup> <n>Thus [were] their names</n> שֹׁמְר֣וֹן <sup>8111 </sup> <n>Samaria</n> אָהֳלָ֔ה <sup>170 </sup> <n>[is] Aholah</n> וִירוּשָׁלִַ֖ם <sup>3389 </sup> <n>and Jerusalem</n> אָהֳלִיבָֽה׃ <sup>172 </sup> <n>Aholibah</n>
5: וַתִּ֥זֶן <sup>2181 </sup> <n>played the harlot</n> אָהֳלָ֖ה <sup>170 </sup> <n>And Aholah</n> תַּחְתָּ֑י <sup>8478 </sup> <n>when she was mine</n> וַתַּעְגַּב֙ <sup>5689 </sup> <n>and she doted</n> עַֽל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>after</n> מְאַהֲבֶ֔יהָ <sup>157 </sup> <n>on her lovers</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>after</n> אַשּׁ֖וּר <sup>804 </sup> <n>on the Assyrians</n> קְרוֹבִֽים׃ <sup>7138 </sup> <n>[her] neighbours</n>

10: הֵמָּה֮ <sup>1992 </sup> <n>They</n> גִּלּ֣וּ <sup>1540 </sup> <n>These discovered</n> עֶרְוָתָהּ֒ <sup>6172 </sup> <n>her nakedness</n> בָּנֶ֤יהָ <sup>1121 </sup> <n>her sons</n> וּבְנוֹתֶ֙יהָ֙ <sup>1323 </sup> <n>and her daughters</n> לָקָ֔חוּ <sup>3947 </sup> <n>they took</n> וְאוֹתָ֖הּ <sup>853 </sup> בַּחֶ֣רֶב <sup>2719 </sup> <n>her with the sword</n> הָרָ֑גוּ <sup>2026 </sup> <n>and slew</n> וַתְּהִי־ <sup>1961 </sup> <n>became</n> שֵׁם֙ <sup>8034 </sup> <n>and she became famous</n> לַנָּשִׁ֔ים <sup>802 </sup> <n>among women</n> וּשְׁפוּטִ֖ים <sup>8196 </sup> <n>judgment</n> עָ֥שׂוּ <sup>6213 </sup> <n>for they had executed</n> בָֽהּ׃ ס
11: וַתֵּ֙רֶא֙ <sup>7200 </sup> <n>saw</n> אֲחוֹתָ֣הּ <sup>269 </sup> <n>And when her sister</n> אָהֳלִיבָ֔ה <sup>172 </sup> <n>Aholibah</n> וַתַּשְׁחֵ֥ת <sup>7843 </sup> <n>[this] she was more corrupt</n> עַגְבָתָ֖הּ <sup>5691 </sup> <n>in her inordinate love</n> מִמֶּ֑נָּה <sup>4480 </sup> <n>was more</n> וְאֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> תַּ֨זְנוּתֶ֔יהָ <sup>8457 </sup> <n>than she and in her whoredoms</n> מִזְּנוּנֵ֖י <sup>2183 </sup> <n>in [her] whoredoms</n> אֲחוֹתָֽהּ׃ <sup>269 </sup> <n>more than her sister</n>

38: ע֥וֹד <sup>5750 </sup> <n>Again</n> זֹ֖את <sup>2063 </sup> <n>they</n> עָ֣שׂוּ <sup>6213 </sup> <n>Moreover this they have done</n> לִ֑י טִמְּא֤וּ <sup>2930 </sup> <n>unto me they have defiled</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> מִקְדָּשִׁי֙ <sup>4720 </sup> <n>my sanctuary</n> בַּיּ֣וֹם <sup>3117 </sup> <n>in the same day</n> הַה֔וּא <sup>1931 </sup> <n>the same</n> וְאֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> שַׁבְּתוֹתַ֖י <sup>7676 </sup> <n>my sabbaths</n> חִלֵּֽלוּ׃ <sup>2490 </sup> <n>and have profaned</n>
39: וּֽבְשַׁחֲטָ֤ם <sup>7819 </sup> <n>For when they had slain</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> בְּנֵיהֶם֙ <sup>1121 </sup> <n>their children</n> לְגִלּ֣וּלֵיהֶ֔ם <sup>1544 </sup> <n>to their idols</n> וַיָּבֹ֧אוּ <sup>935 </sup> <n>then they came</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>about</n> מִקְדָּשִׁ֛י <sup>4720 </sup> <n>into my sanctuary</n> בַּיּ֥וֹם <sup>3117 </sup> <n>the same day</n> הַה֖וּא <sup>1931 </sup> <n>the same</n> לְחַלְּל֑וֹ <sup>2490 </sup> <n>to profane</n> וְהִנֵּה־ <sup>2009 </sup> <n>and lo</n> כֹ֥ה <sup>3541 </sup> <n>thus</n> עָשׂ֖וּ <sup>6213 </sup> <n>it and lo thus have they done</n> בְּת֥וֹךְ <sup>8432 </sup> <n>in the midst</n> בֵּיתִֽי׃ <sup>1004 </sup> <n>of mine house</n>
40: וְאַ֗ף <sup>637 </sup> <n>And furthermore</n> כִּ֤י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>have even</n> תִשְׁלַ֙חְנָה֙ <sup>7971 </sup> <n>that ye have sent</n> לַֽאֲנָשִׁ֔ים <sup>376 </sup> <n>men</n> בָּאִ֖ים <sup>935 </sup> <n>to come</n> מִמֶּרְחָ֑ק <sup>4801 </sup> <n>from far</n> אֲשֶׁ֨ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>to whom</n> מַלְאָ֜ךְ <sup>4397 </sup> <n>unto whom a messenger</n> שָׁל֤וּחַ <sup>7971 </sup> <n>[was] sent</n> אֲלֵיהֶם֙ <sup>413 </sup> <n>and</n> וְהִנֵּה־ <sup>2009 </sup> <n>lo</n> בָ֔אוּ <sup>935 </sup> <n>and lo they came</n> לַאֲשֶׁ֥ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>to whom</n> רָחַ֛צְתְּ <sup>7364 </sup> <n>for whom thou didst wash</n> כָּחַ֥לְתְּ <sup>3583 </sup> <n>thyself paintedst</n> עֵינַ֖יִךְ <sup>5869 </sup> <n>thy eyes</n> וְעָ֥דִית <sup>5710 </sup> <n>and deckedst</n> עֶֽדִי׃ <sup>5716 </sup> <n>thyself with ornaments</n>
41: וְיָשַׁבְתְּ֙ <sup>3427 </sup> <n>And satest</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>and</n> מִטָּ֣ה <sup>4296 </sup> <n>bed</n> כְבוּדָּ֔ה <sup>3520 </sup> <n>upon a stately</n> וְשֻׁלְחָ֥ן <sup>7979 </sup> <n>and a table</n> עָר֖וּךְ <sup>6186 </sup> <n>prepared</n> לְפָנֶ֑יהָ <sup>6440 </sup> <n>before</n> וּקְטָרְתִּ֥י <sup>7004 </sup> <n>mine incense</n> וְשַׁמְנִ֖י <sup>8081 </sup> <n>and mine oil</n> שַׂ֥מְתְּ <sup>7760 </sup> <n>it whereupon thou hast set</n> עָלֶֽיהָ׃ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>and</n>
42: וְק֣וֹל <sup>6963 </sup> <n>And a voice</n> הָמוֹן֮ <sup>1995 </sup> <n>of a multitude</n> שָׁלֵ֣ו <sup>7961 </sup> <n>being at ease</n> בָהּ֒ וְאֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>with</n> אֲנָשִׁים֙ <sup>376 </sup> <n>men</n> מֵרֹ֣ב <sup>7230 </sup> <n>abundance</n> אָדָ֔ם <sup>120 </sup> <n>man</n> מוּבָאִ֥ים <sup>935 </sup> <n>[were] brought</n> [סֹובָאִים כ] (סָבָאִ֖ים <sup>5433 </sup> <n>drunkard</n> ק) מִמִּדְבָּ֑ר <sup>4057 </sup> <n>from the wilderness</n> וַֽיִּתְּנ֤וּ <sup>5414 </sup> <n>which put</n> צְמִידִים֙ <sup>6781 </sup> <n>bracelets</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>on</n> יְדֵיהֶ֔ן <sup>3027 </sup> <n>upon their hands</n> וַעֲטֶ֥רֶת <sup>5850 </sup> <n>crowns</n> תִּפְאֶ֖רֶת <sup>8597 </sup> <n>and beautiful</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>on</n> רָאשֵׁיהֶֽן׃ <sup>7218 </sup> <n>upon their heads</n>
43: וָאֹמַ֕ר <sup>559 </sup> <n>Then said</n> לַבָּלָ֖ה <sup>1087 </sup> <n>I unto [her that was] old</n> נִֽאוּפִ֑ים <sup>5004 </sup> <n>in adulteries</n> [עַתָּ כ] (עַתָּ֛ה ק) [יִזְנֻה כ] (יִזְנ֥וּ <sup>2181 </sup> <n>commit fornication</n> ק) תַזְנוּתֶ֖הָ <sup>8457 </sup> <n>whoredoms</n> וָהִֽיא׃ <sup>1931 </sup> <n>they</n>
44: וַיָּב֣וֹא <sup>935 </sup> <n>Yet they went in</n> אֵלֶ֔יהָ <sup>413 </sup> <n>to</n> כְּב֖וֹא <sup>935 </sup> <n>unto her as they go in</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>about</n> אִשָּׁ֣ה <sup>802 </sup> <n>unto a woman</n> זוֹנָ֑ה <sup>2181 </sup> <n>that playeth the harlot</n> כֵּ֣ן <sup>3651 </sup> <n>Thus</n> בָּ֗אוּ <sup>935 </sup> <n>so went they in</n> אֶֽל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>to</n> אָֽהֳלָה֙ <sup>170 </sup> <n>unto Aholah</n> וְאֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>and to</n> אָ֣הֳלִיבָ֔ה <sup>172 </sup> <n>and unto Aholibah</n> אִשֹּׁ֖ת <sup>802 </sup> <n>women</n> הַזִּמָּֽה׃ <sup>2154 </sup> <n>the lewd</n>
45: וַאֲנָשִׁ֣ים <sup>376 </sup> <n>men</n> צַדִּיקִ֗ם <sup>6662 </sup> <n>And the righteous</n> הֵ֚מָּה <sup>1992 </sup> <n>like</n> יִשְׁפְּט֣וּ <sup>8199 </sup> <n>they shall judge</n> אֽוֹתְהֶ֔ם <sup>853 </sup> מִשְׁפַּט֙ <sup>4941 </sup> <n>them after the manner</n> נֹֽאֲפ֔וֹת <sup>5003 </sup> <n>of adulteresses</n> וּמִשְׁפַּ֖ט <sup>4941 </sup> <n>and after the manner</n> שֹׁפְכ֣וֹת <sup>8210 </sup> <n>of women that shed</n> דָּ֑ם <sup>1818 </sup> <n>blood</n> כִּ֤י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>because</n> נֹֽאֲפֹת֙ <sup>5003 </sup> <n>because they [are] adulteresses</n> הֵ֔נָּה <sup>2007 </sup> <n>in</n> וְדָ֖ם <sup>1818 </sup> <n>and blood</n> בִּֽידֵיהֶֽן׃ <sup>3027 </sup> <n>[is] in their hands</n> ס
46: כִּ֛י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>For</n> כֹּ֥ה <sup>3541 </sup> <n>thus</n> אָמַ֖ר <sup>559 </sup> <n>For thus saith</n> אֲדֹנָ֣י <sup>136 </sup> <n>the Lord</n> יְהוִ֑ה <sup>3069 </sup> <n>GOD</n> הַעֲלֵ֤ה <sup>5927 </sup> <n>I will bring up</n> עֲלֵיהֶם֙ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>against</n> קָהָ֔ל <sup>6951 </sup> <n>a company</n> וְנָתֹ֥ן <sup>5414 </sup> <n>upon them and will give</n> אֶתְהֶ֖ן <sup>853 </sup> לְזַעֲוָ֥ה <sup>2189 </sup> <n>them to be removed</n> וְלָבַֽז׃ <sup>957 </sup> <n>and spoiled</n>
47: וְרָגְמ֨וּ <sup>7275 </sup> <n>shall stone</n> עֲלֵיהֶ֥ן <sup>5921 </sup> <n>with</n> אֶ֙בֶן֙ <sup>68 </sup> <n>them with stones</n> קָהָ֔ל <sup>6951 </sup> <n>And the company</n> וּבָרֵ֥א <sup>1254 </sup> <n>and dispatch</n> אוֹתְהֶ֖ן <sup>853 </sup> בְּחַרְבוֹתָ֑ם <sup>2719 </sup> <n>them with their swords</n> בְּנֵיהֶ֤ם <sup>1121 </sup> <n>their sons</n> וּבְנֽוֹתֵיהֶם֙ <sup>1323 </sup> <n>and their daughters</n> יַהֲרֹ֔גוּ <sup>2026 </sup> <n>they shall slay</n> וּבָתֵּיהֶ֖ן <sup>1004 </sup> <n>their houses</n> בָּאֵ֥שׁ <sup>784 </sup> <n>with fire</n> יִשְׂרֹֽפוּ׃ <sup>8313 </sup> <n>and burn up</n>
48: וְהִשְׁבַּתִּ֥י <sup>7673 </sup> <n>to cease</n> זִמָּ֖ה <sup>2154 </sup> <n>Thus will I cause lewdness</n> מִן־ <sup>4480 </sup> <n>from</n> הָאָ֑רֶץ <sup>776 </sup> <n>out of the land</n> וְנִֽוַּסְּרוּ֙ <sup>3256 </sup> <n>may be taught</n> כָּל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>all</n> הַנָּשִׁ֔ים <sup>802 </sup> <n>that all women</n> וְלֹ֥א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>and not</n> תַעֲשֶׂ֖ינָה <sup>6213 </sup> <n>not to do</n> כְּזִמַּתְכֶֽנָה׃ <sup>2154 </sup> <n>after your lewdness</n>
49: וְנָתְנ֤וּ <sup>5414 </sup> <n>And they shall recompense</n> זִמַּתְכֶ֙נָה֙ <sup>2154 </sup> <n>your lewdness</n> עֲלֵיכֶ֔ן <sup>5921 </sup> <n>and</n> וַחֲטָאֵ֥י <sup>2399 </sup> <n>the sins</n> גִלּוּלֵיכֶ֖ן <sup>1544 </sup> <n>of your idols</n> תִּשֶּׂ֑אינָה <sup>5375 </sup> <n>upon you and ye shall bear</n> וִידַעְתֶּ֕ם <sup>3045 </sup> <n>and ye shall know</n> כִּ֥י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>that</n> אֲנִ֖י <sup>589 </sup> <n>I am</n> אֲדֹנָ֥י <sup>136 </sup> <n>that I [am] the Lord</n> יְהוִֽה׃ <sup>3069 </sup> <n>GOD</n> פ
